welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yelahanka, a charming city known for its historical sites, green spaces, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Yelahanka has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bangalore International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Bangalore International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users can connect for free for up to 2 hours, after which they will be charged.
